name: Harold's Journey
description:
[This game was made for the 2021 Enter the Haroldverse Jam]

--------------------------------------------------------------

A Frost Dragon has appeared and has plunged our hero's town into an eternal winter! Harold must gather his team to brave the frozen wilds to reach the dragon! Explore the origins of Harold's journey to save a village from a chilling end, battling monsters with your array of diverse skills and passives to emerge victorious!

I decided to challenge myself and only use/edit the assets that came with the base engine and without the use of community plug-ins generously provided to RPG Maker users. Enjoy!

--------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated playtime: 30-35 min.
